sectionNotes: Restricted to English or Rhetoric or Creative Writing major(s) or minor(s).
sectionText: Topic Section E: Publishing and Editing This course is designed for students who anticipate working with or in the trade or academic publishing industry. Topics covered include developmental editing and line editing; proofreading; language usage; intellectual property and permissions; developing a marketing plan; submitting queries; electronic publishing; tables, graphs, images, and page layout. Abundant writing and editing practice will be required.  Required texts will include the Chicago Manual of Style
